user_data.target_needs: I wanted comfortable, reliable underwear that provided a good fit and quality for everyday use.
purchase_reason: I was looking for comfortable everyday underwear that wouldn't show under my clothes. The breathable cotton and cooling features were appealing, as I wanted something soft and functional. The positive reputation of the brand also influenced my decision, as I felt confident in the quality based on previous experiences.

I needed a reliable and comfortable option for everyday wear. The description highlighted the quality and fit, which I found appealing. After trying them on, I was pleasantly surprised by how great they felt, which reinforced my decision to purchase. The affordability and brand reputation also played a role in my choice.
user_data.general_preference: I generally prefer products that are made from high-quality, breathable materials, particularly cotton, as they provide comfort and durability. I value items that maintain their shape and color after washing, indicating good quality and longevity. Features like tag-free collars, elasticized waists, and adjustable drawstrings are also important to me, as they enhance comfort and fit. Additionally, I appreciate versatile styles that can be worn in various settings, whether for casual wear, lounging, or active use. Overall, I look for products that offer great value for money and consistently deliver on comfort and quality.

What specific size or fabric preferences do you have for the underwear you are looking for?

I prefer underwear made from high-quality, breathable materials like cotton. Comfort and durability are essential to me. Tag-free collars and elasticized waists are features I value for enhanced comfort and fit. Do you have any recommendations that fit these preferences?

Here are some items that you might like: 
Item No.1 : Item Title: <Fruit of the Loom Women's Eversoft Cotton Hipster Underwear, Tag Free & Breathable, Available in Plus Size> / Item ID: B0B15GQCC1 / Price: $9.29 Category Path: ['Clothing Shoes & Jewelry', 'Women', 'Clothing', 'Lingerie Sleep & Lounge', 'Lingerie'] / Description: ["Start your day bright-eyed and cotton-bottomed with Fruit of the Loom®'s newly reinvented cotton hipsters. The style you love is now softer than ever and built for all day comfort. We've used a finer yarn to create a wonderfully soft feel that will have you ready to tackle the day. These hipsters come with a durable, plush-backed waistband that is guaranteed to remain ravel free wash after wash, and as always, our Fruit of the Loom® panties are tag free and made with a 100% cotton liner for ultimate comfort. These hipsters feature a moderate rise with full seat coverage."] 
Item No.2 : Item Title: <Hanes Women's Sporty Cotton Assorted Boyshort Underwear> / Item ID: B0BB767B8M / Price: $10.49 Category Path: ['Clothing Shoes & Jewelry', 'Women', 'Clothing', 'Lingerie Sleep & Lounge', 'Lingerie'] / Description: ["The Hanes Women's Cotton Boyshort Underwear come in a convenient pack of 6 pairs. They offer it all-comfort, fit and style. You'll also love features like the breathable ultra soft ring spun cotton and an ultra soft, plush back waistband that won't pinch or bind and no-ride-up leg bands that stay in place. Plus, tag-free label means freedom from annoying, scratchy tags. Designed with excellent coverage, these panties come in an assorted color pack, colors may be different than shown in the image. The boyshort style provides full coverage front and back.. Don't compromise on comfort, style and fit, when you can have all three with the Hanes Women's Cotton Boyshort Underwear."] 
Item No.3 : Item Title: <Warner's womens Blissful Benefits No Muffin Top 3 Pack Hipster Panties> / Item ID: B07KBLNZ7H / Price: $12.57 Category Path: ['Clothing Shoes & Jewelry', 'Women', 'Clothing', 'Lingerie Sleep & Lounge', 'Lingerie'] / Description: ["Update your wardrobe essentials with these blissful benefits by Warner's no muffin top hipster panties. They flatter your bottom and mid-section, while offering you all-around comfort and style. These panties feature a lightweight silky microfiber construction with a flexible four-way stretch that offers comfort while allowing you freedom of movement. They also boast an innovative, no dig-in V-front hipster waistband with narrow elastic for a relaxing fit. Choose from a range of colors and sizes for your ideal fit. These no muffin top panties offer plenty of coverage and lie flat against your skin so you can wear them under any type of bottoms."]
